Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.autodownload

Interface IPlaylistAssetProvider

  • public interface IPlaylistAssetProvider
    This interface provides a configurable mechanism to populate asset details when the Virtuoso engine creates new assets automatically using the auto download feature. The interface must be implemented to provide this function if auto downloads are being used in an application. It will need to access appropriate catalog data to populate the necessary asset fields to enable a download to be initiated. The class implementing IPlaylistAssetProvider will be called from a WorkManager based Worker, and may be called when the app is in the background. It will only be called when the SDK determines that the device is online. The IPlaylistAssetProvider is provided to the engine through the IBackgroundProcessingManager interface, which itself is registered via the Android manifest.
    Since:
    3.16.6

    • Method Detail

      • getAssetParamsForAssetId

        VirtuosoPlaylistAssetItem getAssetParamsForAssetId​(String assetId)
                                            throws AssetNoLongerAvailableException
        Implement this method to provide details of an asset, given the asset id and playlist to which it belongs. The caller is expected to do a synchronous lookup of the catalog data, based on the caller-defined external asset ID, and return AssetParams which will be used to create the Asset and add it to the download queue. If the asset details are temporarily not possible to populate then return null and the engine will make the request again after a time interval and when the device is online. If the asset is no longer available in the catalog then throw an AssetNoLongerAvailableException and the engine will remove the asset from the queue and make no further requests for the details. Use HLSAssetBuilder to assemble the parameters for an HLS asset or use MPDAssetBuilder to assemble the parameters for an MPEG DASH asset, or use FileAssetBuilder to assemble the parameters for an single file asset.
        Parameters:
        assetId - The asset id for which to provide the params
        Returns:
        an AssetParams derived instance, which can be generated using an AssetBuilder
        Throws:
        AssetNoLongerAvailableException - if the required asset is no longer available in the catalog

      • didProcessAssetForPlaylist

        IIdentifier didProcessAssetForPlaylist​(IIdentifier asset,
                                       String playlistName)
        Indicates that a new asset has been created. This method will be called as soon as new asset items have been created and prior to being added to the download queue. The provider may further modify the asset object, such as updating the metadata or adding file-unique headers. It is expected that the implementation of this method will call the IAssetManager.update(IAsset) method prior to returning and that any changes made within this method will be made synchronously.
        Parameters:
        asset - The created asset
        playlistName - The associated playlist name
        Returns:
        The updated asset which has been updated and stored if necessary
